com.codekutter.genesis.pipelines

Class PipelineLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codekutter.genesis.pipelines.PipelineLoader

  • public class PipelineLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loader class to read and parse pipeline definitions from a configuration.

    Note: Only XML based configurations are supported for pipeline definitions.
